ModMetaData.name: {{cookiecutter.mod_name}} - Dev Build

ModMetaData.description: {{cookiecutter.in_game_description}} (This is the dev version of {{cookiecutter.mod_name}}. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod to automatically remove this and the title text, as well as any unnecessary files. Make sure to upload the Release version!)
